channel.title: CVE Feed for rahalaboulfeth -- Mail Control – Email Customizer, SMTP Deliverability, logging, open and click Tracking
channel.description: The latest CVEs for rahalaboulfeth -- Mail Control – Email Customizer, SMTP Deliverability, logging, open and click Tracking

item.title: CVE-2023-3158|2024-10-15T01:36:44.218Z -- rahalaboulfeth -- mail%20control%20%E2%80%93%20email%20customizer%2C%20smtp%20deliverability%2C%20logging%2C%20open%20and%20click%20tracking
item.description: The Mail Control plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Stored Cross-Site Scripting via an email subject in versions up to, and including, 0.2.8 due to insufficient input sanitization and output escaping. This makes it possible for unauthenticated attackers to inject arbitrary web scripts in pages that will execute whenever a user accesses an injected page.
